casebody.data:
Jacob B. HIRSHFELD, doing business as J. B. Hirshfeld & Company, Plaintiff in Error, v. TENNESSEE MILLS, Inc., Defendant in Error. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. May 5, 1924.) No. 353.

Before HOUGH, MANTON, and MAYER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed, with costs.
